text: Maj Lillemor "Lill" Lindfors, born 12 May 1940 in Helsinki, Finland is a Swedish singer. She has performed successful in Scandinavia since the 1960s. Together with Svante Thuresson, she performed the song "Nygammal vals during the Eurovision Song Contest 1966, where Sweden ended up 2nd. == References == ==Other websites== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Helsinki Category:Swedish singers
title: Lill Lindfors
